select activity_id, activity_type, remark, create_time, update_by, update_time, create_by, title, start_time, end_time, address, status, participate_conut, content, (SELECT d.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data d WHERE d.dict_type='activity_type' AND d.dict_value = a.activity_type )AS activityTypeName, (SELECT d.dict_label FROM sys_dict_data d WHERE d.dict_type='activity_status' AND d.dict_value = a.`status` )AS statusName from represent_activity WHERE `status` IN(1,2) ORDER BY start_time DESC
